## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description            | Type                           | Default      |
| --------- | --------- | ---------------------- | ------------------------------ | ------------ |
| `size`    | `size`    | Size of the Spinner    | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm" \| "xs"` | `'lg'`       |
| `variant` | `variant` | Variant of the Spinner | `"inverted" \| "standard"`     | `'standard'` |
